sentence.text: She chucks a bath towel to me .
Cameras won , and in chucking my fishing bag ashore , the 4lb breaking-strain cast snapped and the trout was gone .

` Chuck me a can ! "
` Chuck us a hammer , Cyril , " he shouted down bossily , ` the brickwork 's not too bad .
Odd-Knut makes coffee using the method we have become familiar with -- chuck the coffee in a pot , add snow to taste , boil on the stove , when empty add coffee and/or snow as necessary .
` Wilhelm wo n't speak to me since I chucked his Filofax in the jacuzzi .
You can chuck me in the river , if you like , for all the good I am to meself .
We chucked their livers into a large barrel fastened to the mast ; these were sold for cod-liver oil and the money they fetched was the perquisite of the crew .
He chucks it into the sea .
The modern manager establishes his machismo , not by creating a business that can employ thousands , but by buying a business and then chucking all his supposedly supernumerary workers on the dole .
If you just chuck it on the floor , then someone s got to come round alter you and pick it up .
As he filled her glass again he knocked over the salt cellar and quickly chucked the spilt salt over his left shoulder .
Someone had chucked a brick through the gas-mantle on the corner by the Cathedral railings and it had n't been replaced .
In Ancient Rome they 'd have chucked him to the lions .
Dolly chucked the pack at him .
She said she might as well chuck herself out of the window .
When you chuck the arrow , gravity takes effect and it arches realistically in flight .
On duty she strode about looking as if she could not wait to get off duty and chuck a discus .
I go to funerals and chuck earth .
They 'd chuck their pitch-forks , just as if they was javelins .
There 's a load of pigeons round his feet , all fighting over the bits of bread he chucks them .
There is a hollow boom of surf as if some massive object has just been chucked into the sea .

Marie yelled after me to wait but I did n't want to talk to her about it so I chucked my sandwich-box over to her and told her she could eat them for me .
I was impressed by the streamlined efficiency of the Surgicentre ( if a little dismayed by the check 'em in , chop it off , chuck 'em out attitude ) .
